resources.string: You must introduce an image to continue.
You must fill in both fields to continue.
An error has occurred in the creation of the board. Please try again.
You must enter a word to continue.
You must enter at least one word and a description.
You need to add an SD card!
You must select the type of game: Part or Gamut..
You must indicate whether you want words backwards or not.
You must indicate the orientation of the words on the board.
Must indicate the size of the board.
You must indicate the type of clue.
You must add a word and a picture to continue.
Game with this name already exist.
Incorrect configuration. Please check your configuration.
The board is too small. Please check your settings.
